kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Flash Message Should Contain
Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${flash} = You logged into a secure area! ×
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Flash Message is: You logged into a secure area! ×
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.arg: You logged into a secure area!

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Flash Message Should Contain
Wait Until Element Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` contains ``text``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${flash} = You logged out of the secure area! ×
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Flash Message is: You logged out of the secure area! ×
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.arg: You logged out of the secure area!
